item.title: Can Stocks Pull Off a Third Consecutive Year of Big Gains?
item.description: One concern darkening the longer-term outlook is uncertainty about whether the AI boom can continue.

item.title: Young Men Are Making Risky Bets on Crypto and Politics---and Raking It In Right Now
item.description: Markets are booming but the investments and bets that disproportionately draw young men are leaving everything else in the dust.

item.title: Stock Funds Rallied 7.5% in November
item.description: Investors poured into stocks after the election. Also: A Financial Flashback to 30 years ago, the ‘Tequila crisis’ in currency markets.

item.title: Why Few Bond Funds Are Passively Managed---and How to Create Your Own
item.description: The main fixed-income index is an easy benchmark for managers to beat and allows them to charge more for doing so. Solution: Do it yourself.

item.title: UnitedHealth Backlash Signals Possible Shift in Washington and on Wall Street
item.description: Investors have been counting on a deregulatory surge in the health insurance business, but it might not be so simple in the wake of the fatal shooting...
